body_html:
Hi,

I implemented decoding csv using tf.py_func and numpy (test_numpy_csv function in the code below). It seems even reading with numpy is faster than decode_csv.

https://pastebin.com/rTZjCwGH

So far parsing csv using py_func+numpy is ~5 times faster than using decode_csv on this particular synthetic data (1000 examples with 100 float columns)

body:
Hi,

I implemented decoding csv using _tf.py_func_ and numpy (test_numpy_csv function in the code below). It seems even reading with numpy is faster than decode_csv. 

https://pastebin.com/rTZjCwGH

So far parsing csv using py_func+numpy is ~5 times faster than using decode_csv on this particular synthetic data (1000 examples with 100 float columns)
